nodes.text: So Uncivilized: Great Gunslingers in Star Wars
So Uncivilized: Great Gunslingers in Star Wars is a reference article blog post on StarWars.com. It is written by Ed Erdelac. Part 1 was released on September 19, 2013 and Part 2 on October 3, 2013.

So Uncivilized was, for a time, the first source to identify Gallandro's first name as Inbar. However, Erdelac himself stated in the comment section of the blog post that the inclusion of a first name was not canonical but instead part of an older version that slipped into the released text. The inclusion of the first name has since been edited out.
The article places Boba Fett's elevation to Mandalore in 23 ABY, two years after Fenn Shysa's death when Fett agreed to the role.
